snippet: Playwrights and producers discuss whether having been in the 2014 New York International Fringe Festival was worth all the time, effort and money.
abstract: Representatives for shows presented at New York International Fringe Festival in 2014 weigh in, as 2015 Festival approaches, on whether effort is worth it, given cost, frantic pace and competition with vast number of other shows.
lead_paragraph: Playwrights and producers discuss whether having been in the 2014 New York International Fringe Festival was worth all the time, effort and money.

headline.main: One Year Later, Fringe Festival Shows Measure Their Success
headline.print_headline: All That Work Just to Get on a Tiny Stage for a Few Days
